00057 class GraphicView : public QAbstractItemView
00058 {
00059     Q_OBJECT
00060 
00061 public:
00062     GraphicView( QWidget* parent = 0 );
00063     ~GraphicView();
00064 
00065     void SetSceneGraph( GraphicRoot* sceneGraphRoot );
00066

00068     SoCamera* GetCamera() const;

00072 
00073     void ViewDecoration( bool view );
00074     void ViewCoordinateSystem( bool view );
00075

00077     void dataChanged(const QModelIndex &topLeft, const QModelIndex &bottomRight);

00079     void rowsAboutToBeRemoved(const QModelIndex &parent, int start, int end);
00080     void currentChanged ( const QModelIndex & current, const QModelIndex & previous );
00081 
00082 protected:
00083     virtual void setSelection ( const QRect & rect, QItemSelectionModel::SelectionFlags flags );

00085     virtual int verticalOffset() const;
